mapper.select: SELECT account_id AS accountId, email, password, state, date_created AS createDate, date_edited AS editDate FROM t_cms_account WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_cms_account
password = #{password},
state = #{state},
date_edited = current_timestamp
WHERE account_id = #{accountId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cms_account (account_id, email, password, date_created, date_edited) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{createDate}, #{editDate})
